description: Standard table definitions for LSTs (liquid staking tokens)

tables.label: Position Snapshot
tables.description: User level snapshot of holders in this protocol.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

token_address.description: The contract address of the LST token.

user_address.description: The address of the user holding the LST.

amount.description: The amount of LST tokens held in the protocol, decimal normalized.

tables.label: Protocol Snapshot
tables.description: Snapshot at the protocol level, including, TVL and fees data.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

total_value_locked_usd.description: The total value locked in USD (ie, the value of the liquid staking tokens in the protocol).

fees_usd.description: The fees collected in USD in the given snapshot period.

tables.label: Events
tables.description: All user events (ie, Mint, Burn, Transfer)

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

user_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

from_address.description: The address that the event is from (ie, 0x00... address if a Mint).

to_address.description: The address receiving the tokens (ie, the 0x000... address if a Burn).

token_address.description: The contract address of the LST token.

amount.description: The amount of token_address transacted, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of token_address transacted, in USD.

event_type.description: The type of event, corresponds to the action taken by the user (ie, mint, burn, transfer).

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data
tables.description: Transactional data on user level incentives claimed data.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

transaction_signer.description: The address of the account that signed the transaction.

user_address.description: The address of the user who claimed the incentives (could be different from the transaction_signer).

claimed_token_address.description: The smart contract address of the claimed token.

amount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.

other_incentive_usd.description: (Optional) Any incentives outside of the claimed token, in this transaction, summed up in USD terms.
